snippet.title: Video Game Fables - Gameplay / Release Date Trailer (Lighthearted indie RPG)
snippet.description:
Coming July 15, 2022 to Steam! Wishlist and play the free demo:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1577690/Video_Game_Fables/

Get merch here:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/MomijiStudios

"Video Game Fables" is a fun, lighthearted RPG adventure set in a once-traditional RPG world that hasn't had a player in decades. The world's script gets completely ruined by someone calling herself "The Forsaken Princess." It's up to Aru (the world's princess), Nate (an NPC aspiring to be a hero), and Tator (the villain's son) to get things back to normal...or maybe change everything forever.

Solo developed by Matt Sharp (Momiji Studios).

Follow me on Twitter for updates, see some spicy memes on TikTok, and more on my Linktree page:
https://linktr.ee/videogamefables

PRESS KIT:
http://momijistudios.net/press/sheet.php?p=video_game_fables

Music by Levc_EGM:
https://twitter.com/Levc_EGM

SFX for trailer from:
https://www.zapsplat.com
